iterations.raw_response:
```yara
rule Corrected_Exit_Call_Detection
{
    meta:
        description = "Detects calls to exit functions in a specific code pattern"
        author = "Security Analyst"
        date = "2023-10-05"

    strings:
        $a = "8BFF 55 8BEC FF7508"
        $b = "FF7508 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 59"
        $c = "FF7508 FF15 ?? ?? ?? ??"

    condition:
        any of them
}
```
